desc.en: Aru and Sensei exchange New Year's greetings at the event. After anticipating nervously, Aru finally hears Sensei's thoughts on her kimono.
desc.jp: Aru and Sensei exchange New Year's greetings at the event. After anticipating nervously, Aru finally hears Sensei's thoughts on her kimono.
desc.zh_cn: {cf亚瑠}和老师在新春活动会场上向彼此拜年。{cf亚瑠}原本一直很担心别人会说她不适合穿和服，没想到老师却告诉她自己一直很期待看到她实际穿上和服的样子。

name.en: The Side You'd Like to Show
name.jp: The Side You'd Like to Show

name.en: Bells Ringing in the New Year
name.jp: Bells Ringing in the New Year

desc.en: On the last day of the year, Sensei and Kayoko visit the temple to participate in an end of year bell ringing ceremony. Unfortunately, the event had been canceled due to the bell tower's poor condition. They miss the last train that would take them back but greet the New Year with the sound of a bell as the first train of the morning pulls into the station.
desc.jp: On the last day of the year, Sensei and Kayoko visit the temple to participate in an end of year bell ringing ceremony. Unfortunately, the event had been canceled due to the bell tower's poor condition. They miss the last train that would take them back but greet the New Year with the sound of a bell as the first train of the morning pulls into the station.
desc.zh_cn: 今天是一年的最后一天，老师和{cf佳世子}为了参加敲钟活动来到了神社。但很遗憾的是，活动因为钟楼状况不佳而取消了。老师和{cf佳世子}在回程时没能搭上末班车，后来只好在车站听着首班车的信号钟声迎接新年。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Serika begins her part-time miko job but is dismayed when she feels things aren't going well. However, after receiving Sensei's encouragement, Serika becomes the most prominent part-time miko at the event.
desc.jp: Serika begins her part-time miko job but is dismayed when she feels things aren't going well. However, after receiving Sensei's encouragement, Serika becomes the most prominent part-time miko at the event.
desc.zh_cn: 正式成为巫女工读生后，工作上遇到的不顺很快便让{cf茜香}变得闷闷不乐。幸好有老师的鼓励，{cf茜香}很快便重新振作起来，并且成为活动会场上最受瞩目的工读生。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Problem Solver meets with Sensei at the New Year's event and they head inside the venue to make their wishes. The Kaitengers attack just as they're all standing before the offering box.
desc.jp: Problem Solver meets with Sensei at the New Year's event and they head inside the venue to make their wishes. The Kaitengers attack just as they're all standing before the offering box.
desc.zh_cn: 在寻找新春活动会场时，便利屋的成员碰巧发现了老师，于是老师便从善如流地加入了她们的行列，和她们一起走进会场内许愿。就在大家并肩站在赛钱箱前许愿时，凯坦泽朝他们发动了突袭。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.jp: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.zh_cn: 诗音是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作。其有时与麻衣一起出场，在剧情中主要负责新闻实况的解说员，一些新闻大屏幕上常常能看见她充满激情地播报着动态。

举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.zh_cn: 等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

name.en: The End of Problem Solver's Fiscal Year
name.jp: The End of Problem Solver's Fiscal Year

desc.en: It's another new year in Kivotos. What kind of wishes will Problem Solver 68 make amidst the bustling crowds of the New Year's event?
desc.jp: It's another new year in Kivotos. What kind of wishes will Problem Solver 68 make amidst the bustling crowds of the New Year's event?
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯迎来了新年。早早就前往以「实现愿望的地方」闻名的地点的{cn便利屋68}竟然碰上了赛钱箱小偷！究竟他们的愿望将会如何呢……！？

desc.en: It's another new year in Kivotos. What kind of wishes will Problem Solver 68 make amidst the bustling crowds of the New Year's event?
desc.jp: It's another new year in Kivotos. What kind of wishes will Problem Solver 68 make amidst the bustling crowds of the New Year's event?
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯迎来了新年。早早就前往以「实现愿望的地方」闻名的地点的{cn便利屋68}竟然碰上了赛钱箱小偷！究竟他们的愿望将会如何呢……！？

desc.en: The Kaitengers' sudden appearance dazes and confuses Problem Solver, and the Kaitengers make off with the offering box in the blink of an eye. Problem Solver and Sensei take off in hot pursuit of the Kaitengers.
desc.jp: The Kaitengers' sudden appearance dazes and confuses Problem Solver, and the Kaitengers make off with the offering box in the blink of an eye. Problem Solver and Sensei take off in hot pursuit of the Kaitengers.
desc.zh_cn: 由于凯坦泽的攻击来得太过突然，等到便利屋成员们反应过来的时候，凯坦泽早已抢走赛钱箱并扬长而去。为了不让赛钱箱被抢走，老师和便利屋的成员们便开始追击凯坦泽。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Serika and Problem Solver realize something is amiss. They learn what's taking place is a race of greed where the last to claim the offering box also acquires its contents. Problem Solver resumes its pursuit, now more determined to secure the offering box than ever.
desc.jp: Serika and Problem Solver realize something is amiss. They learn what's taking place is a race of greed where the last to claim the offering box also acquires its contents. Problem Solver resumes its pursuit, now more determined to secure the offering box than ever.
desc.zh_cn: 察觉事情的走向不太对劲后，便利屋的成员和{cf茜香}才终于意识到她们加入了一场贪欲竞赛，而赢家可以将箱子里的所有东西据为己有。得知真相后，便利屋的成员们更加坚信不能让赛钱箱被{sn其他}人夺走，而激烈的追击战也因此再度展开。

desc.jp: It's another new year in Kivotos. What kind of wishes will Problem Solver 68 make amidst the bustling crowds of the New Year's event?
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯迎来了新年。早早就前往以「实现愿望的地方」闻名的地点的{cn便利屋68}竟然碰上了赛钱箱小偷！究竟他们的愿望将会如何呢……！？

desc.en: Problem Solver and the Foreclosure Task Force begin their counterattack by spreading a rumor that the offering box is a fake.
desc.jp: Problem Solver and the Foreclosure Task Force begin their counterattack by spreading a rumor that the offering box is a fake.
desc.zh_cn: 随着假赛钱箱的消息传开，便利屋和{cn对策委员会}也正式向黑龟组发动反击。

desc.en: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.jp: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.zh_cn: 诗音是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作。其有时与麻衣一起出场，在剧情中主要负责新闻实况的解说员，一些新闻大屏幕上常常能看见她充满激情地播报着动态。

hobby.jp: 昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

desc.en: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).
desc.jp: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十二首曲子，尤其用于“故事”页及其下属页面中，以及每个故事的结尾（即“To Be Continued”未完待续界面）。

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: It's another new year in Kivotos. What kind of wishes will Problem Solver 68 make amidst the bustling crowds of the New Year's event?

desc.en: Problem Solver comes face-to-face with Kamejima Goro once again. With the help of the Prefect Team and the Foreclosure Task Force, they engage in a final showdown with the boss of the Kurokame Gang.
desc.jp: Problem Solver comes face-to-face with Kamejima Goro once again. With the help of the Prefect Team and the Foreclosure Task Force, they engage in a final showdown with the boss of the Kurokame Gang.
desc.zh_cn: 便利屋的成员们再次来到了龟岛五郎的面前，并在{cn风纪委员会}与{cn对策委员会}的帮助下，向龟组的首脑龟岛五郎展开了最终决战。

hobby.jp: パトロール、大声を出すこと

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.jp: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.zh_cn: 诗音是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作。其有时与麻衣一起出场，在剧情中主要负责新闻实况的解说员，一些新闻大屏幕上常常能看见她充满激情地播报着动态。

hobby.jp: 昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

desc.en: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).
desc.jp: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十二首曲子，尤其用于“故事”页及其下属页面中，以及每个故事的结尾（即“To Be Continued”未完待续界面）。

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
